data.name: Horny Warp: Hentai Fantasy Demo
data.detailed_description:
Make sure to add us to your wishlist!

Introduction


Horny Warp is a game where you take on the role of the savior of a distressed village. Rebuild, play funny minigames and uncover the mysteries of a world you’ve never seen before! The game contains adult content spiced with a pinch of selected humor and beautiful graphics.

Story


Your daily routine is suddenly shattered by a “Summoning Ritual” performed in a foreign realm. They call you the Savior, but ... what will happen next? Your job is to help the villagers alongside with girls and find a way to get back home!

Demo features


  • Two heroines from different worlds;
  • 4 animated adult scenes;
  • Fun minigame;
  • A bunch of fetishes for everyone;
  • A captivating story full of flirtation and humor;
  • Voiced adult scenes;
  • Variable dialogue options;

data.short_description: Welcome to the story, which takes part in the magic medieval realm! Horny Warp is an erotic game with hot sex scenes, visual novel elements, village building, and more! This demo contains two heroines who will keep you company on this adventure and will form a pretty strong bond with you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 or better
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

highlighted.name: I Don’t Wanna Do This No More…

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity
- Sex scenes
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old
